summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) inmate record for Jeffrey Epstein, generated on April 29, 2020. It details his housing assignments, custody status, and personal information from his time at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, culminating in his recorded death on August 10, 2019. The record shows he was held on charges of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the Bureau of Prisons inmate record, detailing his custody, housing assignments, and death while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NYM).

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's death is recorded in the inmate record with a date/time of August 10, 2019, at 07:36.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Custody Entry
events.description: The inmate record begins tracking Epstein's custody details, including his admission and initial housing assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NYM) - 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
New York, NY 10021 (listed as Epstein's residence)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's official Bureau of Prisons inmate register number was 76318-054.
Epstein was in custody on federal charges of 'Sex Trafficking Conspiracy' and 'Sex Trafficking of Minors'.
The document records Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, at 07:36.
The record shows multiple housing unit transfers within the MCC New York facility in the weeks leading up to his death.
The document was generated on April 29, 2020, as part of a records request, confirming Epstein's status was 'DEATH'.
